Welcome to the home of R North East an R user group based in Newcastle. 

Here you'll find information about upcoming talks and [events](events.html). Our group usually meets up once every two months. 

You can find us on Twitter [\@RstatsNE](https://twitter.com/RstatsNE) and we also have a [Slack chat](https://rslackinviter.herokuapp.com/) 

We are always looking for new speakers so please get in touch if you are interested in giving a talk at our meet up.
